lead_paragraph: Midfielder Riccardo Montolivo missed out on his second straight major tournament due to injury on Tuesday while Daniele De Rossi was included in Italy's 23-man squad for next month's European Championship in France.

headline.print_headline: Montolivo Misses Out for Italy Again, De Rossi In
headline.main: Montolivo Misses Out for Italy Again, De Rossi In

snippet: Midfielder Riccardo Montolivo missed out on his second straight major tournament due to injury on Tuesday while Daniele De Rossi was included in Italy's 23-man squad for next month's European Championship in France....
